attributes.additional_details:
This Bill will support the authorities and our communities in outlawing/ banning groups that seek to murder or commit terrorist acts.
It MIGHT have stopped Drummer Lee Rigbys murder.NOW will Nick Clegg admit he was wrong? This Bill is NOT aimed at people with nothing to fear and the police do not have an interest in " snooping ".
PLEASE PROTECT YOURSELVES ON A NON-RACIST & NON-POLITICAL ISSUE-whatever others say.  STOP HATE FUELLED INTERNET CONTENT
